column2: Bradley Elementary School\r65600 Dixie St. • Bradley
column4: Principal\ritrejo@bradleyusd.org\rhttps://bradleyusd-ca.schoolloop.com/\r\r--------2018-19 School Accountability Report Card\rPublished During the 2019-20 School Year\r\rPrincipal’s Message\rI am truly pleased to be able to share my philosophy and joy of learning with the students and\rfamilies of Bradley Elementary School. Before coming to Bradley I worked as a Title I Reading\rTeacher
column6: K-8 Resource Specialist Teacher and School Principal. I\rwas also the Coordinator of Student Services for San Luis Coastal Unified School District. These\rvaried work experiences have given me a unique view of students struggling and succeeding at all\rlevels.Differentiatedinstruction
column10: compassion and a family-like atmosphere are what all of our\rstudent require and expect from their Bradley School education. I work with our dedicated staff\r-----\revery day to make that occur and the future a bright and positive place for all of our students.\r---\r\rBradley Union Elementary\rIan M. Trejo
column11: MS is the current Superintendent/Principal of Bradley Union School District. Mr. Trejo\rSchool District\rholds a Bachelor of Science degree in Biology from Sonoma State University and a Master’s of\r65600 Dixie Street\rScience degree in Special Education from National University.\rBradley\r805-472-2310\rhttp://bradleyusd-ca.schoolloop.comMission Statement\r\rOur school wide educational program will prepare our diverse students to meet or exceed state\rDistrict Governing Board\rstandards
